name: House of Velez part 1
description: House of Velez is a horror game based around stealth/puzzle elements. It emphasizes sneaking, running and hiding mechanics to surpass obstacles rather than combat. This game draws inspiration from titles like Haunting Ground and even film such as the 1980's Hellraiser.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7 - 5500U CPU @ 2.40GHz 2.39GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 940M DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: MUST HAVE A CONTROLLER TO PLAY (XBOX ONE LAYOUT RECOMMENDED)
